content:
XX opened issue #7006:

bjorn3 commented on issue #7006:

This is the issue I think https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/f46d5a3c9544fe1550e24ca6c32d88293f3f2c9c/crates/wasi/src/preview2/preview1.rs#L1614 path is a string, so not every length of truncation would leave behind a valid UTF-8 string. The truncation should probably be done on a Vec<u8> instead.

alexcrichton commented on issue #7006:

Thanks for tracking this down @bjorn3!

I believe this should be fixed by https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/7011, but @XX can you test and confirm?
